subject_terms_3: Rail transport Pertadbiran Keretapi Tanah Melayu Artistic photography
physical_appearance: The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. There is just a single set of railroad present in the photograph, without a train is travelling on that railroad. The railroad makes a straight line. To the right of the image, there are some trees located on a lower plane than the railroad. The railroad is being supported on a bridge and it employs a truss. The truss forms a series of interconnected triangles above the railroad tracks.
sgcool_label_text: "This image is part of the ""Tracking Memories"" collection by the late Mr Kwek Leng Joo. The collection captures different aspects of the Malayan Railway story in Singapore
subject_terms_2: Railroads Black-and-white photography Truss bridges Railroad bridges Pertadbiran Keretapi Tanah Melayu
